data.app_name: Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable - Early Access
data.description:
**Now available in Early Access!**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
{1280368342833344}
Prepare for combat with Omni-Directional Mobility Gear and fly head-first into battle! Defy all odds and eliminate the Titans!

Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable, the first-person action-adventure VR platformer based on the highly acclaimed manga “Attack on Titan” and the latest installment of the VR series. 



Join the Scout Regiment as an aspiring recruit and help defend mankind from the Titan invasion.


# Omni-Directional Mobility Gear
Utilize the Omni-Directional Mobility Gear to maneuver through the air and combat the onslaught of Titans! 
{1195760871453526}


# The Titan Threat
Titans rely on their instincts to hunt humans and satisfy their insatiable appetites.
Overcome the fear of death and lay waste to the Titan army!
{1042373100565202}


# Distinct Weapons
Each weapon offers unique characteristics that can alter the course of battle and how it is approached!
{469443659357575}



# Roadmap
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38984470_1529176937991447_6731511555124357528_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0PWjKH-JuTQQ7kNvgH4OVlO&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AdHkZJe1VWdTQ8Ht-FnKWn-&oh=00_AYAZfNFyxThSu2e_iNcf6KR3UFsE6ZeT1ObxJBr9IEr9qw&oe=66E97113)
Early Access will consist of the first two chapters.
There will also be free update support through Early Access and 1.0.
The second half of the campaign and mulit-player co-op support will release alongside 1.0 later in 2024.

changelog.change_log:
Ver.0.1.1726 Update
- Fixed an issue where players could get stuck between fallen training Titans and the ground in the tutorial.
- Fixed an issue where the blade would rotate unexpectedly.
- Fixed an issue where the anchor would stick in the air under certain conditions.
- Fixed an issue where the new weapon unlock display would not appear under certain conditions.
- Fixed an issue where the journal could not be grabbed at the base.
- Fixed an issue where damage effects would not disappear.
- Fixed an issue where the edge of the vignette display was cut off.
- Fixed the discrepancy between the player's perspective and the characters' height settings.
- Adjusted some Titan behaviors.
- Fixed an issue where the anchor UI was displayed on the result screen.
- Fixed various UI display issues.
- Fixed other minor bugs.


Ver.0.1.1726 アップデート
・チュートリアルで倒れた訓練用巨人と地面に挟まって動けなくなる不具合を修正
・ブレードが回転してしまう不具合を修正
・特定の条件で空中にアンカーが刺さってしまう不具合を修正
・特定の条件で新規武器取得表示がされない不具合を修正
・作戦基地でバインダーが掴めなくなる不具合を修正
・ダメージエフェクトが消えない不具合を修正
・ビネットの表示の端が切れてしまう不具合を修正
・プレイヤーの視点と登場キャラクターの設定身長のずれを修正
・一部巨人の挙動の微調整
・リザルト画面でアンカーUIが表示されている不具合を修正
・UI表示不具合の修正
・その他軽微なバグを修正
